General.Name: Saudi American Holdings Corp
General.GicIndustry: Internet Software & Services (discontinued effective close of September 28, 2018)
General.GicSubIndustry: Internet Software & Services (discontinued effective close of September 28, 2018)
General.Description: Saudi American Holdings Corp. engages in the sale and lease of aircraft and aircraft engines. It also provides aircraft and aircraft engines maintenance and overhaul services, as well as sells aircraft parts. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Ft Lauderdale, Florida.
General.Address: 729 NW First Street, Ft Lauderdale, FL, United States, 33311
